page.title: 20HOME LIFE IN GRANGETOWN
page.content: {My typical Friday - Nicholas Brydon {( age 11 ) { On Friday morning I get up at 8 a.m., I have a wash and get dressed. Then I have some cereal or toast for breakfast. At 8.45 a.m. I leave for school. In school we have an assembly and then a spelling test. At 10.35 a.m. we have play for 20 minutes. This is followed by Maths ( or English ) until 12 which is lunch time. I have sandwiches for lunch. In the afternoon, which begins at 1.30 p.m., we have Music followed by an art lesson ,which lasts for the rest of the day until 4 p.m. Then I go home and watch T.V. before having tea at 5.30 p.m. I watch T.V. until bed time at 11 p.m.
